p: α-Copaene was also identified, and its contents were 3.25% and 4.84% in the EO extracted from the samples collected in 2017 and 2018, respectively, by HD. The sample collected that same year was subjected to extraction by steam distillation, in which this compound was obtained in greater quantities (10.98%). This sesquiterpene has antioxidant and antigenotoxic activities [ 34]. There are also reports in the literature that host plants producing α-copaene are able to influence the mating of Ceratitis capitate, the male Mediterranean fruit fly [ 35].
